short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Claim all channel point for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
want you watch your stream flux in full screen without problem ? this extension is made for you

Automatically claim your bonus channel points on Twitch by clicking the bonus button automatically

While enjoying your favorite Twitch stream, you collect bonus reward points automatically.

You just need to open your stream and profit,  ( work with full screen and multi tabs )
